medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain and low grade fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 2 days ago with initial abdominal and pelvic cramping, progressing to diffuse abdominal pain that later localized to the left lower quadrant (LLQ). The pain was sharp and severe, without radiation. Patient has been constipated for the past 4 days.
medical_history.social_history: Recently returned from a cruise, but none of her family members that traveled with her are experiencing similar symptoms.
